dc_description_s: This point shapefile represents cities and towns in the United States at 1:2,000,000 scale. This layer is part of the 2014 ESRI Data and Maps collection for ArcGIS 10.2. U.S. National Atlas Cities provides information about the locations, names, and populations of cities and towns for conducting geographic analysis on national and large regional scales. National Atlas of the United States, ESRI and U.S. Geological Survey. (2014). United States National Atlas Cities, 1972-2004. ESRI.
dc_creator_sm: National Atlas of the United States
